title: Contemporary art exhibition takes inspiration from heritage collections (The University of Liverpool)
text: ( Source : The University of Liverpool ) An art exhibition inspired by the University 's heritage collections and the personal memories of artist, Emma Gregory , has opened at the University's Victoria Gallery & Museum. The concept for the
